## New input1:
```java
    int year = 2020;
    int half = 1;
```
Explanation: This input is valid because it represents a valid year and half-of-year combination.

## New input2:
```java
    int year = 2020;
    int half = 2;
```
Explanation: This input is valid because it represents a valid year and half-of-year combination.

## New input3:
```java
    int year = 2020;
    int half = 3;
```
Explanation: This input is invalid because there is no half-of-year 3.

## New input4:
```java
    int year = 1900;
    int half = 1;
```
Explanation: This input is invalid because 1900 is not a leap year.

## New input5:
```java
    int year = 1900;
    int half = 2;
```
Explanation: This input is invalid because 1900 is not a leap year.
